title: pakhitheboss
author: pakhitheboss
content: Hugeblack who is a merit source has started a good initiative. If you see a good post or a useful one on our local board that needs recognition then you can report such post in the below thread. Remember you need to read the rules first before reporting any post. [Merit] Help posts in local boards that did not receive enough merits

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: I was not aware that hugeblack is a merit source. I was the first one to reply on that thread and appreciated it. I did thought of creating the same topic on our local board, later on forgot. Good to see you created this topic on our board as there are a few topic that I think missed the recognition on our board. I am planning to post those topics on that thread. I am quoting the rules from the that thread. If anyone is planning to report a post on it please follow these basic rules.Quote from: hugeblack on August 31, 2023, 02:23:03 PMRules:  - Follow the format below. - This is for Local boards only. - Maximum 10 links. - Add only topics/replies with 0 merits. - You are allowed to add topics/replies from any user as long as they are in the same local board. - You may get Merits if the links you shared here are useful. - You can participate once per month, if you repeat the participation more than once per month, added links will be deleted and you may get natural trust. - I have the right to add new rules, not to send merits, and to delete replies.

comments.author: Bitcoin Smith
comments.body: I saw that thread too but with very little activity, I am not sure if we have a chance to stand with, especially among the Nigerian friends who congested the whole thread with tons of submissions.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Smith on September 07, 2023, 07:38:18 PMI saw that thread too but with very little activity, I am not sure if we have a chance to stand with, especially among the Nigerian friends who congested the whole thread with tons of submissions.It's not about chance, if he feels your topic deserves merit he will give it. Yes, there are a lot of submissions by the Nigerian board that does not mean he won't look into your post. As per the last update he is out of Merits for now and will get them in 5 day's time. You can submit your post with max 10 topics on that thread. Do check the rules and the format before submitting.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: I have a big list of post which I have gathered from the local board. I have chosen those that I felt are worthy of merits. I will be forwarding them to hugeblack as per my discussion with him. I won't commit that those post would get merited as it is not in my control.Going forward this thread would be only used for publishing links of post that I think are worthy of getting merits. I am going to post those links tomorrow here and then I will lock it.
